title: 820-3476 with x on battery symbol
message: got this macbook 820-3476 that shows an x on the battery symbol. Whenever you unplug it goes into sleep mode slowly. any suggestions? could tjis be the resistors? i get 10v on ppv_batt_g3h

title: 820-3476 with x on battery symbol
message: Voltage on PPBUS_G3H with just the charger and no battery plugged in?

title: 820-3476 with x on battery symbol
message: 12.3 voltas on ppbus_g3h with just the 85w charger and no battery plugged in

title: 820-3476 with x on battery symbol
message: This would indicate an issue on the SMBUS data lines between the ISL and the SMC. Do a diode mode reading on pin 2 of both R5380 and R5381.
